intro.title: Join us at GOSIM Hangzhou 2025, China's premier open-source conference, where innovation, collaboration, and technological breakthroughs converge.

tracks.title: 5 Cutting-Edge Tracks
tracks.ai_models_desc: Foundation models, edge inference, generative AI, tools for AI training and beyond.
tracks.embodied_ai_desc: Apply AI in the real world, from humanoid robotics to autonomous systems.
tracks.agentic_web_desc: Decentralized applications, identity, privacy-enhanced technologies, and collaborative platforms.
tracks.apps_agents_desc: Cross-platform and AI-assisted app dev, Rust GUI apps, WebAssembly, and super-app ecosystems.
tracks.ai_next_desc: AI Enabled Use Cases, AI Devices, Human AI Interfaces, AI Platforms, and AI Governnances

venue.subtitle: Venue
venue.title:
Hangzhou Platinum Hanjue Hotel
杭州白金汉爵酒店
venue.location: Hangzhou, China - Where Innovation Meets History
venue.description: Experience GOSIM Hangzhou 2025 in a city renowned for its historical legacy and vibrant technological future. Hangzhou, a historical gem and modern tech hub, offers the perfect backdrop for inspiration, networking, and breakthrough innovations.

proposals.title: Call for Proposals - 8/18 Due
proposals.description: We're looking for bold ideas and fresh voices to shape the future. If you have insights on cutting-edge technology, emerging trends, or transformative practices, we want to hear from you. Submit a proposal to speak and join a lineup of innovators, thought leaders, and changemakers pushing the boundaries of what's next.

co_located_events.title: Co-located Events
co_located_events.description: We are excited to host these co-located events at GOSIM Hangzhou 2025.
co_located_events.rust_global_desc: RustGlobal is the first Rust Foundation-hosted gathering dedicated to the use of Rust in global leadership settings.
co_located_events.ai_vision_desc: An exclusive forum for global thinkers and practitioners to explore a symbiotic future for AI and humanity, ensuring technological progress is guided by core human values.
co_located_events.open_sdg_desc: A global conference uniting experts in open source, AI, and policy to accelerate the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) through open collaboration and technology.
co_located_events.super_agent_desc: A developer 'Campathon' that combines a training camp with a hackathon, challenging participants to build personalized and emotionally intelligent 'Super Agents' for next-generation interaction.
co_located_events.code_alert_desc: An AI hackathon based on the classic game "Red Alert." Competitors will use natural language to command an AI agent through online challenges and live final battles.

sponsorship.title: Sponsorship Opportunities
sponsorship.description: Reach thousands of people in your target audience by becoming a supporting organization at GOSIM Hangzhou 2025.
sponsorship.disclaimer: *Previous GOSIM conference sponsors shown for illustration purposes only.

spotlight.title: GOSIM AI for Human Spotlight
spotlight.description: Towards a Symbiotic Future of Ethical and Creative AI: What if AI wasn't just built to serve, but to co-create with us? AI for Human Spotlight is an international showcase for projects that explore how generative AI can foster empathy, shared creativity, and ethical coexistence.

previous_events.title: Previous Events
previous_events.paris_desc: Over 1000 attendees and luminaries delved into the multifaceted development of AI for our 2-day GOSIM Paris event in the city of lights.
previous_events.beijing_desc: Attracted more than 1700 attendees, GOSIM Beijing is by far the largest GOSIM event ever in the historical capital of China.
previous_events.delft_desc: GOSIM Delft was a two-day event with 3 tracks that brought together 1200 attendees from not only the Netherlands, but all around the world.
previous_events.shanghai_desc: Where everything started, GOSIM conference and workshop focused on championing and enhancing open-source contributions.

get_tickets.title: Grab your GOSIM Hangzhou ticket
get_tickets.description: Secure your spot today at GOSIM Hangzhou 2025. Collaborate with innovators, engage with industry pioneers, and be part of shaping the future of open-source technology.

speakers.title: Featured Speakers
speakers.page_description: GOSIM Hangzhou 2025 is a gathering of open-source AI projects, developers, researchers, and industry sponsors to share knowledge, learn from each other, and collaborate.
speakers.hero_text: From foundational models to cutting-edge research, our speakers will cover a wide range of topics to help you stay at the forefront of AI innovation.

workshops.page_description: GOSIM Hangzhou 2025 is a gathering of open-source AI projects, developers, researchers, and industry sponsors to share knowledge, learn from each other, and collaborate.

tickets.page_description: Get your tickets for GOSIM Hangzhou 2025. Join us for China's premier open-source conference.

sponsors.page_description: GOSIM Hangzhou 2025 is a gathering of open-source AI projects, developers, researchers, and industry sponsors to share knowledge, learn from each other, and collaborate.
sponsors.hero_text: We're excited to bring you an incredible experience, made possible by the generous support of our Sponsors and Supporting Organizations. We've partnered with true innovators that are pushing the boundaries of our industry.
